title: Champion of Khione
name: Urscoat - Champion of Khione
printed_effect:
You can target a face-down Rune.
It cannot be played as long as this Urscoat is
Enchanted. This effect can be activated one
additional time on your turn if you also
Disenchant {frost} from your Khione.
effect: You can target a face-down Rune. It cannot be played as long as this Urscoat is Enchanted. This effect can be activated one additional time on your turn if you also Disenchant {frost} from your Khione.
